feed.title: CHECKSEQUENCEVERIFY - We need more usecases to motivate the change

entry.title: CHECKSEQUENCEVERIFY - We need more usecases to motivate the change
entry.summary: Rusty Russell, on bitcoin-dev, expresses his dissatisfaction with the current lack of control over bitcoind's perception of time, making it difficult to conduct blackbox testing. He then requests a new feature to solve this issue. Shortly after, Gavin informs him about the setmocktime function, which Rusty is pleased with.
